cgcloud__BO_API__c.name: cgcloud__BO_API__c
cgcloud__BO_API__c.description: This table stores the header record of Business Object APIs.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the Business Object API belongs.

cgcloud__Unique_Key__c.description: Stores schema constraints. This is a technical field that the workflow updates, and it's unique (case-insensitive). ExternalId. Value: Name+Sales_Org
